member.name: P:MMS.Core.Properties.Resources.LocalizationValidationScripts_jsdeliver
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to <!-- cldr scripts (needed for globalize) --> <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/rxaviers/cldrjs@0.5.1/dist/cldr.js"></script> <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/rxaviers/cldrjs@0.5.1/dist/cldr/event.js"></script> <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/rxaviers/cldrjs@0.5.1/dist/cldr/supplemental.js"></script>
<!-- globalize scripts --> <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/globalizejs/globalize@1.4.2/dist/globalize.js"></script> <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/globalizejs/g [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:MMS.Core.Properties.Resources.LocalizationValidationScripts_local
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to <!-- cldr scripts (needed for globalize) --> <script src="/lib/cldr/dist/cldr.min.js"></script> <script src="/lib/cldr/dist/cldr/event.min.js"></script> <script src="/lib/cldr/dist/cldr/supplemental.min.js"></script>
<!-- globalize scripts --> <script src="/lib/globalize/dist/globalize.min.js"></script> <script src="/lib/globalize/dist/globalize/number.min.js"></script> <script src="/lib/globalize/dist/globalize/date.min.js"></script> <script src="/lib/globalize/dist/globalize/currency.min.js"></s [rest of string was truncated]";.

en-US, fa-IR, de, fr

member.summary: Optional: Specify the redirect policy for when the language is changed Default value: RedirectTo.SamePage

summary.para: Creates an email link with circled check mark if the email is confirmed; otherwise shows an exclamation mark.
Uses Font-Awesome by default; but can be changed.
Indicates whether the email is confirmed or not or it's unknown.

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.UrlTemplate
member.summary: A URL template for paging buttons e.g. ?p={0}&s={1}&q=test

summary.para: ViewContext property is not required to be passed as parameter, it will be assigned automatically by the tag helper.
View context is required to access TempData dictionary that contains the alerts coming from backend

member.summary: Creates a pagination control

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.PageNo
member.summary:
current page number.
default: 1
example: p=1

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.PageSize
member.summary:
how many items to get from db per page per request
default: 10
example: pageSize=10

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.TotalRecords
member.summary:
Total count of records in the db
default: 0

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.MaxDisplayedPages
member.summary:
if count of pages is too much, restrict shown pages count to specific number
default: 10

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.GapSize
member.summary:
Gap size to start show first/last numbered page
default: 3

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.SettingsJson
member.summary: name of the settings section in appSettings.json default: "default"

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.PageSizeNavBlockSize
member.summary: This property is deprected. Use PageSizeDropdownItems instead

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.PageSizeNavMaxItems
member.summary: This property is deprected. Use PageSizeDropdownItems instead

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.PageSizeDropdownItems
member.summary: A list of dash delimitted numbers for page size dropdown. default: "10-25-50"

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.PageSizeNavOnChange
member.summary:
action to take when page size dropdown changes
default: this.form.submit();

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.QueryStringKeyPageNo
member.summary:
Query string paramter name for current page.
default: p
exmaple: p=1

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.QueryStringKeyPageSize
member.summary:
Query string parameter name for page size
default: s
example: s=25

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.QueryStringValue
member.summary: query-string-value is obsolte and will be removed in a future release.

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.ShowPageSizeNav
member.summary:
Show drop down list for different page size options
default: true
options: true, false

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.ShowGap
member.summary: Show a three dots after first page or before last page when there is a gap in pages at the beginnig or end

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.ShowFirstLast
member.summary:
Show/hide First-Last buttons
default: true, if set to false and total pages > max displayed pages it will be true

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.ShowPrevNext
member.summary:
Show/hide Previous-Next buttons
default: true

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.ShowTotalPages
member.summary:
Show or hide total pages count
default: true

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.ShowTotalRecords
member.summary:
Show or hide total records count
default: true

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.ShowLastNumberedPage
member.summary:
Show last numbered page when total pages count is larger than max displayed pages
default: true

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.ShowFirstNumberedPage
member.summary:
Show first numbered page when total pages count is larger than max displayed pages
default: true

The text to display at page size dropdown list label

Next button text

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.Ajax
member.summary: Set to true to use ajax pagination

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.AjaxConfirm
member.summary: The message to display in a confirmation window before a request is submitted.

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.AjaxMode
member.summary: The mode that specifies how to insert the response into the target DOM element. Valid values are before, after and replace. Default is replace

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.AjaxLoadingDuration
member.summary: A value, in milliseconds, that controls the duration of the animation when showing or hiding the loading element.

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.AjaxLoading
member.summary: The id attribute of an HTML element that is displayed while the Ajax function is loading. Default is #loading-spinner

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.AjaxBegin
member.summary: The name of the JavaScript function to call immediately before the page is updated.

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.AjaxComplete
member.summary: The JavaScript function to call when response data has been instantiated but before the page is updated.

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.AjaxFailure
member.summary: The JavaScript function to call if the page update fails.

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.AjaxSuccess
member.summary: The JavaScript function to call after the page is successfully updated.

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.AjaxUpdate
member.summary: The ID of the DOM element to update by using the response from the server.

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.AjaxUrl
member.summary: The URL to make the request to.
